Package stocks.controller

Class PortfolioGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocks.controller.PortfolioGUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Features, PortfolioController
    public class PortfolioGUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Features, PortfolioController
    This class implements the methods of Portfolio Controller for GUI.
